mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY prt_code DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(a.order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS order_date, d.cp_code, c.prt_name, c.prt_price, b.order_qty, (c.prt_price*b.order_qty) AS order_price FROM orders a, order_Inf b, product c, company d where a.order_no = b.order_no and b.prt_code = c.prt_code and a.cp_code = d.cp_code

SELECT a.order_no, e.cp_code, e.cp_name, c.prt_name, b.order_qty, f.lot_qty FROM orders a, order_Inf b, product c, product_out d, company e, lot f where a.order_no = b.order_no and b.prt_code = c.prt_code and a.cp_code = e.cp_code and a.order_no= d.order_no and f.mp_code =c.prt_code
select PRT_CODE PRT_NAME PRT_STANDARD PRT_UNIT PRT_PRICE PRT_IMAGE from product where prt_name = #{prtName}

SELECT 'PRD_'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(cp_code, -3)),0)+1,3,0) FROM product
insert into product (prt_code, prt_name, prt_standard, prt_unit, prt_price, prt_image) values( #{prtCode}, #{prtName}, #{prtStandard]}, #{prtUnit}, #{prtPrice}, #{prtImage} )
